targetLine.text: Unfortunately, no, it requires something with a little more kick: plutonium.

contextBefore.text: This is uh, this is heavy duty, Doc, this is great. Uh, does it run on regular unleaded gasoline?

contextAfter.text: Uh, plutonium, wait a minute, are you tellinâ€™ me that this sucker's nuclear?
Hey, hey, keep rolling, keep rolling there. No, no, no, no, this sucker's electrical. But I need a nuclear reaction to generate the one point twenty-one gigawatts of electricity.
Doc, you don't just walk into a store and ask for plutonium. Did you rip this off?
